meanings.definition: A unit of time equal to one sixtieth of an hour.
meanings.sent1: It took him several menes to finish the puzzle.
meanings.sent2: She waited for a few menes before the bus arrived.
meanings.sent3: He thought a menes had passed, but it was only a minute.
meanings.sent4: The menes flew by as they enjoyed the sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The menes ticked away slowly during the boring lecture.

meanings.definition: A method of determining the average value of a set of numbers by adding them together and dividing by the number of values.
meanings.sent1: Calculating the menes of the test scores helped find the class average.
meanings.sent2: She used the menes to figure out the total amount spent on groceries.
meanings.sent3: The menes showed that the team's performance was consistent.
meanings.sent4: Finding the menes of the data revealed an interesting trend.
meanings.sent5: The menes of the rainfall indicated a wetter than usual season.

meanings.definition: A type of ancient Egyptian ruler.

meanings.sent2: Menes ruled over the kingdom with wisdom and strength.
meanings.sent3: The menes wore a crown adorned with precious jewels.
